name: who ate all the fish
description:
Your hibernation gets interrupted and there's a problem in the nearby village. 
Talk to the animals to see what's going on and get to know them.
Then go back to sleep.

Very small game made for Bitsy Jam #78.

I wanted to make something very simple using the Bitsy engine exactly how is intended, the game is basically a town to explore with animals to talk to, very much inspired by Pokemon or generic JRPG towns. 

Credits:

Planning/Art/Writing/Music by Wandering Artist
(soundtrack available soon on bandcamp!)

Logic consultant and testing by OctaviaPone
